EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Bootiful CQRS with Axon.
Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, November 16, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}} Time: 3:00PM UTC / 10:00AM EST
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1294919/C8D276578F1DB9C7DEEAF6B57943D0E4]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
